name: Brandon Palmer
text: Limited menu items but great pizza as usual.

name: rosemary delagarza
text: I went with a bunch of friends, we had a few different kind of pizza, the bean dip was good and the drinks were find . We just had a great time and the employees our friendly.

name: Kevin Rogers
text: Updated after second visit: First visit for lunch - Seated immediately, order taken within a minute, arrived within 14 minutes.  Ordered a standard pepperoni pizza priced at what you'd expect at an airport.  Small beer selection.  Pizza is …More

name: JD
text: Barely survivable food poisoning. Literally ruined my vacation. Don't eat here, they definitely are not storing their food properly

name: Steven Agostino
text: Its an airport restaurant, need I say more. Service was great... food.. let me put it this way. If my wife was a hard-core drug addict, she would still make me a better sandwich

name: Leslie
text: Food was horrible! It was a cold pre-made sandwich from the day before and an old salad straight out of the grocery store bag! I could have purchased a better meal from the local convenience store!!! Completely disappointed!

name: kyle connors
text: We got sat quickly. The waiter was nice just really slow. The food took a while to come out but was good. The crust was nice and the topping all started fresh. The Bloody Mary was different but really good. A good place to eat lunch while waiting to board your plane.

name: Rob Driskill
text: Had the turkey bacon club and a cease salad. Food was good and service was friendly. Finished with a piece of their key lime pie which was delicious.

name: Muhammad Inamov
text: Little expensive and food tastes very different

name: Gina Hirayama
text: The food wasn't anything spectacular or special but still good. Our service was above and beyond expectations!! They didn't have what our kids wanted to drink. Our waitor graciously went to another store and bought them what they wanted. I have never experienced such kindness!

name: D an
text: I had a long layover at DFW on 2/14/19.  I stopped in to California Pizza and ordered the cauliflower pizza with 1 mixed drink.  The food quality was excellent.  But the true shining star of my experience was Marcy, the lady tending bar. …More

name: Harold McPherson
text: Waiter named Josh was extremely  rude to me and my wife said he was working the amount of two people ( they don't have a cashier ) but me being a store manager of a retail store knows that that still is zero excuse .... will give food 5 stars cauliflower pizza is amazing thin crust

name: Aya Ahmad
text: The food is spectacular. It’s one of the best CPK chains I’ve been to. Absolutely amazing food and fast service.

name: Patrick Schuchardt
text:
Wow
I was alone at a table and was seated next to a nice couple and we ordered at about the same, though with different waiters. The man at the table next to me got …More

name: Saryah Aleese
text: Only giving an extra star because the pizza was good. We understood it was busy due to cancelled flights. I had to get up and ask for extra plates, get my own hot sauce, and my drink was never refilled, we also asked for a to-go box and …More

name: Lauren Barnett
text: Great BBQ chicken pizza, but not worth $18. The staff is super friendly and they have a bar, as well as food options other than pizza. Worth checking out if you have a lot of time left till your flight leaves.

name: Sportsdocmom Nanthan
text: Super slow service... at an airport location not functional when you have flights to catch. After almost 1hour wait they barely discounted the pizza only.. took about 15 min to get guacamole and chips... not worth the wait...

name: Dustin Sparks
text: Great service. Great food. 10 out of 10

name: Tamara Bramnik
text: The pizza is horrible and over priced. Service good but that’s about it!

name: Olivia Kort
text: Not good.  I ordered the CPK salad and it came with 4 of the like 8 items listed.  It was gross... I ate some of it because I thought my flight was leaving on time, but it was 2 hours delayed.  I had to eat somewhere else to get enough food …More

name: Diego R
text: I love California Pizza and was very disappointed with this location at the airport. Everything is bad. Terrible service. Terrible salads. The worse pizza I ever had. Big mistake coming here.

name: Eduardo Caceres
text: Arrived at 9:50am. Try to order breakfast but told by the waiter I was too late. They stop serving at 10:00am. Asked him to check with the kitchen to make sure they were still serving. …More

name: Joseph Ghesquiere
text: Cauliflower crust pizza was pretty good, but man that was the worst service I’ve experienced in a while

name: Anders Nielsen
text: We had some time before we had to board our flight. And I had a craving for pizza, so I found this place on the airport map, and I dragged my daughter and girlfriend there . …More

name: Pumpkin Fury
text: Solid location.  I have done here a few times and service is all way great.  Everyone jumps in to help out.  Never had a long wait for food here.  Will come by again in the future.

name: dwayne parrette
text: Ok if ur ordering Pizza, but the salads were awful, mostly just iceberg lettuce and a few tomatoes.  The chicken tortilla soup had one small piece of chicken and forget about the white corn guacamole with a teaspoon of avocado!  Awful place!

name: Susanne Groeller
text: Pizza is good, but too pŕicy. Service is average.

name: Pavel Bocharnikov
text: Going thru the reviews I almost walked by, but hey I'm here, our server Mercedes was very kind and nice, we ordered pizza and salad. Got our food in about 15 minutes, food was great. Service was great! Idk what ppl talking about it, we had …More

name: Jarliew
text: By far the worst CPK on the planet

name: Siani Moore-Miller
text: They have low carbed  pizza and the most weirdest foods

name: USS Lohr
text: Food is excellent and reasonably priced. Staff is courteous and we'll versed about the menu and what all comes with the meal.

name: Jen Doxey
text: Would have given ZERO stars if it were an option. News flash, you are in an airport serving “To Go” food. You should probably reconsider your “kids only” rule for certain items on your menu. Does it really matter that my 13-year old wants …More

name: Alex Idrees
text: Terrible is the word that comes to my mind as I sit here and wonder if this is how showcase southern hospitality at the airport for those coming in for the first time. I  live and I Train customer service and user experience so I maybe a …More

name: N P
text: Dismal.  Got a Cobb salad and the ingredients all tasted and appeared old.  Servers were all very nice though.

name: Ricardo Contreras
text: I only had the breakfast pizza due to arriving at the airport before 10am. The breakfast pizza was delicious & light just perfect for the next departure.

name: Andrew Gardiner
text: The waitress was polite and patient. I didn't feel rushed by her to order at all. Great food, as well.

name: Adam Craig
text: I love CPK and the staff there were very nice.. But 16 bucks for a pizza?! I know it's the airport but come-on!

name: shiv bhalodia
text: Where to begin....flies hovering around my table. Waiters were really slow with service. Almost missed my flight. Much better alternatives to this place.

name: Melissa Sheffield
text: Had two mojitos, crushed pea and barley soup, and  guacamole with sweet corn. So Yummy! The Mojitos were delicious and I must try to make the guacamole at home. Service was very friendly and prompt.

name: Nayeema Nasrin
text: People are rude. They are not friendly. They are extremely condescending. I would have understood if it were if they were super busy and lots of people waiting for them to attend. But it was not. They are just rude.

name: Sal
text:
I ordered turkey club here $15+ , the bread was old and cold and the turkey tasted funny ,
I asked the waitress why is the bread so terrible she said yes that is the way …More

name: Marc Johlic
text: One star only because the woman managing this place was a real TOOL.   I asked if I could substitute a bag of pretzels or chips instead of the soup or salad that came with the $14 sandwich and she looked at me like I had asked to kick her …More

name: Kings Bing
text: The pretty girl at the front has no personality and is short with words comes off as rude. The lady at the bar is nicest bae tender ive ever met very friendly.. if not for her would have gave 1 star...just avoid the girl that does take out orders shes nit pleasant

name: Edith Smith
text: This was a good CPK.  We all really enjoyed our food.  Nice service, too.

name: TaM
text: Great pizza and service !

name: Trevor Huffman
text: Food came quickly. It wasn't the same quality you typically expect. Prices were too high, even for an airport.

name: M P
text: Good job doing a limited CPK menu in an airport, one of the best choices in Terminal A

name: Max Volek
text: The kitchen was closed at 8 PM. Pretty ridiculous for a restaurant in a major airport.

name: Jameson Craig
text: Prompt service, delicious pizza, cold beer. Yum!

name: Weric Amaral Silva
text: I liked the pasta and the service.

name: James Kim
text: Ordered the Kung Pao Spaghetti - was horribly salty. Sent it back and it was exactly the same.

name: Hans-Viktor P
text: Friendly service and a really fresh and tasty spinach and mushroom pizza.

name: Prapti Patel
text: Quick and friendly service. But very expensive for such small portions.

name: Larry Goodale
text: It's decent pizza. Pricing is a bit higher, but that's to be expected in an airport.

name: rig ram
text:
I just went in fer some drinks before my flight.
Beer was cold. Whiskey was wet. However..... They had some stubborn fruit flys harassing the customers. Will not come back.

name: Dave McCann
text: Airport location did not appear to have the whole menu.  Open later than other restaurants, which was a good thing for me.

name: Brigette Anderson
text: Not a full menu. They do not offer the cauliflower crust so low-carb options are pretty limited.

name: Lucas Wild
text: Pretty disappointed my wife and I got the same meal we typically order at all other pizza cafes and we got 1/3rd the normal portion we are used too.  Would have complained, but had to catch a flight.

name: Chris Klein
text: I ate at the bar and had 45 minutes before I needed to head to the gate. The bartender said I had plenty of time. He was the slowest bartender I have ever seen, and had no sense of urgency in anything he did. In addition to that, his …More

name: Sheila Waiyaki
text: Very poor service sat for 30mins and no one served me.

name: Peter Frances
text: I love their pizza

name: Jeff M
text: Good food, but pricey and slow service.

name: Jason Childs
text: Airport food. Not a real deal CPK. Limited menu.

name: Nick Mecca
text: $13.52 for a tiny sandwich. It was...meh?

name: Tom Cornwall
text: Watch what you order. They could not get our order right.

name: Bill V
text: Go elsewhere. Ugh.

name: Dominic DeSantis
text: I mean it's pizza at an airport what do you expect?

name: Bruce Kersis
text: Was okay..... busy

name: Javier Rodriguez
text: Great service!

name: Juergen Riedl
text: (Translated by Google) Bad joke! Excessive prices are normal at airports, but here the bird is shot down. $ 17 for a pizza that's barely bigger than a salad plate! The Coca-Cola was almost not to taste of pure chlorine !!!! I'm used to a …More

name: Elijah jimerson
text:

(Original)
Ehh
